description:
A Meowth belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam.
After forcing to switch from Arbok, Ash used the third and final Pokémon he was randomly assigned.
Inside the third Pokéball was a Meowth which he used to battle the Intructor`s Vaporeon. Meowth was defeated by a single Ice Beam used by vaporeon.
name: Nyarth (Kyoukan)
